MS MCQs

    Get started with Microsoft Teams Rooms

    »

    1. What is the Teams Meetings lifecycle?

      The process by which you schedule and end a Microsoft Teams meeting.

      Leveraging Microsoft Teams to manage a meeting, from creating the agenda through post-meeting follow-ups.

      Using Microsoft Teams to record a meeting so that it can be viewed later.


    2. What is the device called that in-room attendees can use to join a meeting with one touch?

      Console

      Compute module

      Front of room display


    3. What is the name of the feature that lets remote meeting attendees easily see an analog whiteboard?

      Proximity-based join

      Whiteboard touching and inking

      Content camera


    4. What are the network requirements for Microsoft Teams Rooms?

      Wireless only

      Physical ethernet only

      Both wireless and wired ethernet
